name: Nuclear Bunker (Survival)
description: This is a game where you have to try and scavenge for food and keep yourself alive while also buying anti radiation bags to not die. This game is all about finding the perfect balance and keeping yourself alive and live for as many days as possible (Please post your scores in the comment section) .  As always, just download it and open the file, it will then open up on your browser and will begin to play. I made this in 2 days so just keep that in mind.
